Back:
Provides secure and resizable virtual servers on AWS.
Provides resizable compute capacity in the cloud.
Designed to make web-scale computing easier for developers.
Platform for scaling and deploying web apps and services.

Web application hosting.
Batch processing.
Web services endpoint.
Desktop in the cloud.

Defines the processor, memory, and storage types.
Cannot be changes without downtime.nProvided in the following categories:
   General Purpose
   Computer, memory and storage optimized
   Accelerated computing
Pricing is based on instance type.
Some instance types have unique capabilities:
   GPUs
   Specialized storage
   Etc.

Front: Describe Amazon EC2 Root Device Types
Back:
Instance Store:
   Ephemeral storage that is physically attached to the host for the virtual server.
   NOTE: If you shut down an Instance Store server, its storage and data are deleted!
Elastic Block Store:
   Persistant storage that exists separately from the hsot for the virtual server.

Template for an EC2 instance including configuration, operating system, and data.
AWS provides many AMIs that can be leveraged.
AMIs can be shared across AWS accounts.
Custom AMIs can be created based on your configuration.
Commercial AMIs are available in the AWS Marketplace.

Front: What are the purchase types for compute services?

Back: Pay by the second for instances that are launched.
Instances purchased for 1-3 years at a discount.

Unused EC2 capacity in a region at a large discount.
Can provide up to 90% discount over on-demand pricing.
If your bid is higher than the spot price on the market, your instance will launch.
If the market price grows to exceed your bid price, your instance will be terminiated.

All Upfront
   - Entire cost is paid upfront
   - Maximum savings over the 1-3 year period.
Partial Upfront
   - Part of the 1-3 year cost is paid upfront
   - Reduced monthly cost.
No Upfront
   - No upfront payment is made.
   - There will be a reduce montly cost.

Reserved - Great for an instance that is consistent and always needed.

On-Demand - Great for inconsistent need that cannot be stopped without affecting the job.

Spot - Lowest cost option for workloads that can be stopped/startd without affecting the job.

- Automates the process of deploying and scaling workloads on EC2 (Paas)

 - Supports a specific set of technologies.

 - Leverages existing AWS service.

 - Only pay for the other services you leverage.

 - Handles provisioning, load balancing, scaling, and monitoring.

Front: What Application Platforms does AWS Elastic Beanstalk Support?
Back:
- Java

 - .NET

 - php

 - Node.js

 - Python

 - Ruby

 - Go

 - Docker

Front: What are the features of AWS Elastic Beanstalk?
Back:
- Integated monitoring
 - Deployment
 - Scaling
 - EC2 Customization

- Deploy an application with minimal knowledge of other services
 - Reduce the overall maintenance needed for the application.
 - Few customizations are required.
